publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1056 Mike Watson on behalf of the Finance Committee: Written Agreements on Budgeting Processâ€”That the Parliament notes the three written agreements between the Parliament and the Scottish Ministers on the budgeting process (SP Paper 155) and agrees their terms.
S1M-1056 Written Agreements on Budgeting Process (lodged on 26 June 2000) Mr Jack McConnell*
